title: Article on Corporate Work/Relaxation Mix Highlights the Advantages of a Social Experience Outside the Office, Says Leon Caf and Lounge
text:
Commenting on the recent article, the Glendale Café and Hookah Lounge explains how they can help bring employees together by inviting business groups into their lounge, or by coming to them with catering services.
Los Angeles, CA (PRWEB) September 08, 2015
In an article posted July 21st on BizBash.com, the author explored how modern day businesses often use mini-retreats to restaurants, bars, and lounges to give employees a chance to bond and socialize in a relaxing environment outside of the office. The article explained how these private events are a great way for employees of a company to feel a sense of togetherness that reminds everyone that they are all on the same team and working towards a common goal. According to the event experts at Leon Café and Lounge, some of the best venues for these events are those that can provide a delicious meal in addition to an added element that employees can enjoy for even more bonding. Leon Café and Lounge notes that, after an expertly prepared meal, many customers like to further unwind by taking advantage of their high-quality hookah services at their beautiful Glendale location. They explain that while the food and their hookah both can stand on their own, the combination makes for a truly enjoyable workplace outing:
Expertly Prepared Food –Leon Café and Lounge is open to individuals and groups, with a variety of cuisine influenced from the most popular dishes around the world. While their expertise is based in Mediterranean dishes, the chefs at Leon Café and Lounge point out that some of their fan favorite dishes are their burgers, pastas, pizza, and appetizers that are sure to delight comfort food aficionados. They note that every member of work groups with even the most varied and diverse palates can find something to love at Leon Café and Lounge. Relaxing Hookah – Anyone familiar with hookah and shisha knows that there is a remarkable difference between a hookah that is prepared with care, and those that are more hastily thrown together. Leon Café and Lounge notes that they pack and present their hookahs with great care so that groups and individuals get an enjoyable and mellow smoking experience every time. They note that the idea of the “peace pipe” is universally true, and the bonding that emerges from sharing a hookah is incredibly strong in terms of bringing people together.
By bringing their next work event to Leon Café and Lounge, the Glendale restaurant notes that businesses can get everything that they could be searching for in a special event location. While event organizers looking only for delicious food will surely be pleased with what the café has to offer, those looking for more will also feel right at home at Leon Café and Lounge. Anyone interested in more information about their menu and services, or to schedule their next event today, can call Leon Café and Lounge at 818-243-4585 or visit them online at http://www.LeonCafeandLounge.com .
